body:
Hello @jorisvandenbossche! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - In the file [`doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_console_highlighting.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_console_highlighting.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 23:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_console_highlighting.py#L23): [E305](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E305) expected 2 blank lines after class or function definition, found 1

 - In the file [`doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 230:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L230): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (95 > 79 characters)
> [Line 232:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L232): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (80 > 79 characters)
> [Line 353:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L353): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (84 > 79 characters)
> [Line 354:65](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L354): [E231](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E231) missing whitespace after ','
> [Line 391:39](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L391): [E261](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E261) at least two spaces before inline comment
> [Line 525:5](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L525): [E303](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E303) too many blank lines (2)
> [Line 538:27](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L538): [E261](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E261) at least two spaces before inline comment
> [Line 585:32](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L585): [E225](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E225) missing whitespace around operator
> [Line 615:44](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L615): [E228](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E228) missing whitespace around modulo operator
> [Line 883:12](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b9079e9f7aadd75b334f6a90b01de6e21ba6e7f7/doc/sphinxext/ipython_sphinxext/ipython_directive.py#L883): [E713](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E713) test for membership should be 'not in'

The doc build on travis looks good, and locally as well.

I think the biggest difference in removing/overwriting our own version is that we no longer have the custom `DecodingStringIO` that was introduced in https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/6185 to deal with unicode execution results when building the docs (I think this was specifically on Windows, in any case on linux it is working, but would be nice if somebody could  test this on Windows)
BTW, I am not going to fix those PEP8 linting warnings, since this would deviate us again from upstream. The linter on travis does not fail on it in any case.

# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/19765?src=pr&el=h1) Report

Merging this, but it would still be good to get feedback from somebody using Windows
